i1.name: Dismounted Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Kled''' is only vulnerable to {{tip|death}} while dismounted. '''Kled''' has {{sti|health|{{as|{{pp|{{ccd|Kled|hp_base}}+{{ccd|Kled|hp_lvl}}*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1))}} '''base''' health}}}}, which is not improved by sources of {{as|'''bonus''' health}}, as well as reduced {{as|'''base''' movement speed}}, 80% {{tip|basic attack}} damage against {{tip|champion|champions}}, and increased {{sti|attack range}}. Percent-health effects consider '''Kled & Skaarl's''' combined {{as|'''maximum''' health}}, meaning that an unmounted '''Kled''' is always considered to be ''low'' health.

'''Kled''' gains {{pp|100 to 185|color=ms}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} when moving towards enemy {{tip|champions}} within {{tt|900|estimated}} range, as well as the ability to generate [[File: Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard 3.png|20px]] ''{{as|Courage|buzzword}}''.

{{sbc|Innate - Courage:}} '''Kled''' gains 15 {{as|Courage|buzzword}} when [[basic attack|basic attacking]] an enemy champion, 20 {{as|Courage|buzzword}} whenever an enemy champion he damaged dies within 3 seconds, 4 {{as|Courage|buzzword}} for {{tip|minion}} kills, and 5 {{as|Courage|buzzword}} when basic attacking a [[structures|structure]] or epic {{tip|monster}}. At 100 {{as|Courage|buzzword}}, '''Skaarl''' returns with {{sti|health|{{as|{{pp|4|key=%|50 to 80|1 to 16}} of '''Skaarl's''' '''maximum''' health}}}}. {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard||''Mounting up''}} resets the {{sti|cooldowns}} of {{ai|Bear Trap on a Rope|Kled}} and {{ai|Jousting|Kled}}.

While at the allied [[Spawn|fountain]], 25 {{as|Courage|buzzword}} is generated every {{fd|0.25}} seconds. {{si|Recall|Recalling}} fully restores '''Skaarl's''' {{as|Courage|buzzword}} and health. If reuniting outside of base, '''Skaarl''' gets ''Frayed Nerves'', which prevents him from gaining {{as|Courage|buzzword}} for 30 seconds.

The current status of '''Kled's''' own health is preserved between subsequent dismounts. While mounted, {{tip|heal|healing}} will first affect '''Skaarl's''' health and will only restore '''Kled's''' health while '''Skaarl''' is at ''full'' health.
i1.notes:
* [[Decoy]]s are counted as champions for all of this ability's effects, other than the takedown one.
* '''Kled's''' {{as|health}} is rounded up while '''Skaarl's''' is rounded down.
* {{ii|Gargoyle Stoneplate}} can increase '''Kled's''' {{as|'''base''' health}}.
* It is possible to get the {{as|Courage|buzzword}} from base but have '''Kled''' and '''Skaarl''' reunite out of base.
* It is possible for the [[Nexus Obelisk]] to not be able to bring '''Kled''' down from '''Skaarl''' for a few seconds, even if '''Skaarl''' has no health.
* {{Pending for test}} {{ai|Wild Growth|Lulu}} and {{ii|Elixir of Iron}}

q1.name: Pocket Pistol
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Kled''' periodically [[stock]]s an ammo charge, up to a maximum of 2. '''Kled''' will store ammo even while {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard|Kled|mounted}}.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Kled''' sprays a cone of five {{as|pellets|buzzword2}} in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} while {{tip|dash|recoiling}} 250 units in the opposite direction.

{{as|Pellets|buzzword2}} collide into the first enemy champion they hit, and deal 20% damage per pellet beyond the first. Each {{as|pellet|buzzword2}} that hits an enemy champion or epic monster restores {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard 3|Kled|Courage}}, by 5 and {{fd|2.5}} respectively.
q1.notes:
* The backwards dash from ''Pocket Pistol'' can pass terrain.
* ''Pocket Pistol'' can be cast while {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}} but '''Kled''' will not {{tip|dash}} backwards.

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|35 to 95}} {{as|(+ 80% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|35*1.8 to 95*1.8}} {{as|(+ 144% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 80% bonus AD)
  • Maximum Damage: (+ 144% bonus AD)

w1.name: Violent Tendencies
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Kled''' periodically enters a frenzy that grants him {{sti|attack speed|{{as|150% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}} on his next 4 basic attacks within 4 seconds after the first, with the final attack dealing {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, capped against {{tip|monster|monsters}}.
''{{tip|Turrets}} are only affected by the base damage.''

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Bonus Physical Damage|{{ap|20 to 60}} {{as|(+ {{ap|4.5 to 6.5}}% {{as|(+ 5% per 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} of target's '''maximum''' health)}}|Maximum Damage Against Monsters|{{ap|220 to 260}}}}
effects.str:
• Bonus Physical Damage: (+ % (+ 5% per 100 bonus AD) of target's maximum health)
  • Maximum Damage Against Monsters:

st_slices: (+ % (+ 5% per 100 '''bonus''' AD) of target's '''maximum''' health)

subeffects.title: Bonus Physical Damage
subeffects.str: (+ % (+ 5% per 100 '''bonus''' AD) of target's '''maximum''' health)

e1.name: Unmounted Jousting
description: This ability is unusable while {{ai|Dismounted Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard|Kled|unmounted}}.
